field.name: summary
field.value: Allow CreateInterfaceProxyWithTargetInterface to be able to permanently change target

field.name: description
field.value: When using CreateInterfaceProxyWithTargetInterface to generate proxies that allow changing the invocation target, it would be nice to be able to change the target permanently. This might manifest itself by changing the IChangeProxyTarget to ChangeInvocationTarget(object target, bool permanently)

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: It would be hard, if not impossible with the current architecture. Also this might break in multithreaded scenarios.

comment.author: cneuwirt
comment.text: No problem. It is not worth the effort then. I imagine there is little performance impact on using IChangeProxyTarget.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: I think, that after all this is not so hard to do, and it may be a good feature to have actually.
